name: Zombie Danger
description:
Zombie Danger™

"Oh NO! A Laboratory Has Let Out A Virus! Everyone's Being Affected By It. It's Turning Them Into... ZoMBIeS!! Luckily You Weren't Harmed. 

This Game Is A "Top-Down View" Shooter. Survive For How Long You Can. Collect Money From The Zombies, Build Machines To Do The Work."

There Are MANY More Updates That is Yet To Come.
